title: I Need Font Suggestion
content:
Hello,

Can anyone tell me what is the common elegant formal font in serif and sans serif?

Regards

Yury
author: yury90

comments.content:
I suspect you will get a different answer from each person who replies, but I would say Bodoni is often considered an elegant Serif font, and Optima is considered an elegant sans.

- Mike Yanega
Surely it depends also on context. What type of work/project/thing have you in mind?
